scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a bust of a bearded man with long, wavy hair, wearing a reddish robe and a green and gold patterned collar. He has a halo around his head, indicating a sacred figure. Two eight-pointed stars are visible, one on each side of his head, and abstract shapes are present in the upper corners. His hands are clasped in front of him. The overall impression is of a devotional image, likely representing Christ or a saint.
